main event: A pulsating, flashing light the size of a large automobile was observed in the sky in Arlington Heights, Illinois on December 29, 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared to be hovering and then suddenly disappeared.
The witness could not physically see the object due to street illumination, but estimated its size to be that of a large automobile from 60 feet away.
The object changed colors from reddish-orange to yellow to white.
The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute.
No sound was associated with the object.
sighted object: a pulsating, flashing light in the sky
